explains: adj. 丹麦的；丹麦人的；丹麦语（文）的

sentences.en: Are they talking Swedish or Danish?
sentences.cn: 他们说的是瑞典语还是丹麦语？

sentences.en: A plane with Danish markings was over-flying his vessel.
sentences.cn: 一架带有丹麦标志的飞机正从他的轮船上空飞过。

sentences.en: He concluded a deal with the Danish minister in Washington.
sentences.cn: 他在华盛顿与丹麦公使达成了一项协议。
